title: johnsaributua
author: johnsaributua
content: I'm talking about transactions in different countries, decentralized systems can be maximized including P2P.I'm interested in selling tokens and some past work.1. how do you make escrow in this forum?2. If with the application, with what so that we can trust each other (seller and buyer)?3. complete your chronology of past transactions with your favorite theory with his method.Overall we know the forum is the right place for buying and selling etc. do you think it is necessary to worry in this way?

comments.author: Getmon
comments.body: I am not an escrow but it is necessary to use escrow in dealing with people that you do not know personally. The usual way here is by sending the funds to an escrow and once confirmed and secured, the goods will be sent to the buyer. If you are selling tokens, you have a choice to send it to the escrow or let the buyer send its payment to the escrow first.The most popular escrow I always heard of in this forum is @minerjones. You can send him a dm.
